did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology.Department of Human Development.

did.physdesc: Data sheets, survey forms, memos, interview material, articles, minutes, review files, memoranda, photographs, correspondence, videocassettes, and audiocassettes.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Data sheets from a survey done in a course, "Orientation in Child Development 100"; sheets entitled "Child Preferences of Food," "Description of Early Home," "Important Factors in Early Childhood," "Community Provisions for Child Welfare," "Early Play Materials," "Garment Remembered Most Vividly," and "Books Read."

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: In 1925 the Dept. of Family Life was organized and in 1945 the name was changed to the Dept. of Child Development and Family Relationships. In 1969 the name changed to Human Development and Family Studies and during the 1998-99 year it was shortened to Human Development

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Data sheets from a survey done in a course, "Orientation in Child Development 100"; sheets entitled "Child Preferences of Food," "Description of Early Home," "Important Factors in Early Childhood," "Community Provisions for Child Welfare," "Early Play Materials," "Garment Remembered Most Vividly," and "Books Read."

Survey forms, memos, interview material and articles for a project conducted by Professor Harold Feldman, to study a first baby's effect on his parents' relationship with each other. The project was supported by a grant from the United States Public Health Service.

Includes videos of Steven Ceci on ABC's 20/20 and the McNeil-Lehrer News Hour in 1993 and one by Cynthia Hazen entitled "Relationships in the 90's" the other "Work and Family: Exploring the Issues" by Eileen Trzcinski and Elaine Wethington.
Includes faculty meeting minutes, external review files, department memoranda, colloquia information, photographs, and correspondence.
Includes preschool intelligence tests such as: Stanford-Binet, Rorschach, Illinois test of psycholinguistic abilities, Holtzman inkblot technique and Gesell.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIAL
relatedmaterial.p: Additional material and digital versions can be found online here: http://ecommons.library.cornell.edu/handle/1813/531
